page.title: 14Housing 1 - Yardley
page.content: By far the vast majority of houses in our area are terraced and semi-detached.Only very rarely did we find a detached house although there are bungalows. There are blocks of flats in the area but most of these are not very tall,each block being usually only three storeys high. There are also some maisonettes. Generally the houses seem to be in very good condition, while the flats are not. They suffer from rotting window frames,damp walls and doors which need repairs.In one part of the area the houses have survived much better than the flats although they all tend to be rented not owned. See also Local History page.
